author: superlouis.eth
content:
Hello everyone! I successfully managed to contribute to the KZG after multiple failed attempts on browser and only a few minutes with the go client. I have the impression that the lobby is not really a queue, but an open room where everyone sends contributions at regular intervals and if you're lucky enough you'll be included, is that right? 
That would mean that if you leave and come back, with your browser, you don't actually "lose" your spot, you'll have the same odds of being included
(I would like to onboard more people into the ceremony)

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> Hey Louis, great that you got your contribution in. Your understanding of the lobby is correct, that is why we named it a lobby, not a queue.
